content:
My apologies for misunderstanding your previous request. Here are some one-liner options that meet your specifications:

* We remember and honor the sacrifices of the language martyrs on International Mother Language Day.
* Preserving heritage, one language at a time – One Dream celebrates International Mother Language Day.
* On this International Mother Language Day, we pay tribute to those who fought for the recognition of our mother tongue.
* Our language is our identity, and we are grateful to the martyrs of the Bengali Language Movement who gave their lives to protect it.
* One Dream proudly celebrates our roots and language on International Mother Language Day.
